    • Uses of IClassifier in net.sf.jclec.problem.classification.algorithm.tan

      Classes in net.sf.jclec.problem.classification.algorithm.tan that implement IClassifier 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  TanClassifier
      Classifier for Tan et al. 2002 - Mining multiple comprehensible classification rules using genetic programming

      The Tan et al. algorithm states that the rules within the classifier must be sorted according to their specificity value.
